Cherrycake\Modules\Stats::commit

Stores the cached StatsEvents into the database, should be called periodically, normally via a JanitorTask

    Signature

    public function commit()

    Returns

    array
    An array where the first key is a boolean indicating wether the opeartion went ok or not, and the second key is an optional hash array containing detailed information about the operation done.
